sec.p: We thank Evrogen for developing the normalised cDNA libraries and the University of Liverpool Advanced Genomics Facility for performing the 454 sequencing. Jessica Stapley patiently assisted with graphing in R and Robert Ekblom provided much assistance with the NGen assembly. We thank the four anonymous reviewers, who provided very helpful suggestions to improve the manuscript. This work was funded by a grant awarded to Jon Slate by the European Research Council (ERC).
